text: The dhow is a type of boat. It is Middle Eastern in make. The boat is a popular type of transport along the Nile river. The dhow is normally small with a big sail mostly 2 of the body stacked on top of each other . Usually used to move across water safely this water is a liquid thats not a non- newtonian liquid simply to say it this boat is not meant for massive ships but shorter trips acros canals rivers or other small bodies of water of fishing trips as a large ship is useful for them as its sturdy when in rivers it tips over when is rough seas way quicker Category:Sailing Category:Boats
title: Dhow
